Overpowering Retribution.name: Overpowering Retribution
Overpowering Retribution.flavor: A solid blow to your enemy lets you forget the pain it caused.
Overpowering Retribution.trigger: You are damaged by an enemy’s attack
Overpowering Retribution.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. If your attack does more damage than the triggering attack, reduce the damage from the triggering attack to 0.
Overpowering Retribution.special: If you use your furious assault racial power to add extra damage to this attack, you gain a +2 power bonus to your next attack roll made before the end of the encounter with an avenger attack power or a mighty judge paragon path attack power.

Sentence of Banishment.name: Sentence of Banishment
Sentence of Banishment.flavor: Your enemy has two options: to face you, or to be banished to a realm where it feels your god’s wrath.
Sentence of Banishment.effect: The first time the target makes an attack that does not include you as a target before the end of the encounter, remove the target from play after the attack is resolved. If the target is under the effect of your oath of enmity, that effect ends and you regain the use of your oath of enmity power. The target returns to play at the end of its next turn in the same square from which it was removed, or in the nearest unoccupied square.
Sentence of Banishment.special: If you use your furious assault racial power to add extra damage to this attack, you gain a +2 power bonus to your next attack roll made before the end of the encounter with an avenger attack power or a mighty judge paragon path attack power.

Ameliorating Onslaught.name: Ameliorating Onslaught
Ameliorating Onslaught.flavor: Your powerful strike lets you share your strength with an injured companion.
Ameliorating Onslaught.effect: You enter the ameliorating onslaught stance. Until the stance ends, whenever you gain the damage bonus from your Censure of Pursuit class feature when you hit an enemy, one ally within 5 squares of that enemy regains hit points equal to the damage bonus from your Censure of Pursuit class feature.
